Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Kn2(G3K) (BmKn2 analog, synthetic AMPs, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (92.31%) toparent peptide BmKn2I: 23%, L=F=A=K: 15%.Activity:Activity: active against S. aureus ATCC 29212 (MIC 5 ug/ml) and E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 40 ug/ml).In vitro toxicity: HC50 < 25 ug/ml, hemolytic.
Literature Information.Author: Luo X, Ye X, Ding L, Zhu W, Yi P, Zhao Z, Gao H, Shu Z, Li S, Sang M, Wang J, Zhong W, Chen Z. 2021
Literature Information.Title: Fine-Tuning of Alkaline Residues on the Hydrophilic Face Provides a Non-toxic Cationic alpha-Helical Antimicrobial Peptide Against Antibiotic-Resistant ESKAPE Pathogens.
